Title: Used People
Actors: Shirley MacLaine, Bob Dishy, Emma Tammi, Asia Vieira
Plot: At her husband's funeral, Pearl (Shirley MacLaine), Jewish mother of two divorced and antagonistic daughters, meets an old Italian friend (Marcello Mastroianni) of her husband, whose advice years previously had stopped the husband leaving home. For 23 years he, now a widower, has secretly loved Pearl...
Awards: Nominated for 2 Golden Globes. Another 2 nominations.
